hero_description: I build efficient, scalable, and user-focused web applications with modern technologies like Java, Spring, .NET, and React.
about_description: I am a software developer specializing in building scalable and efficient web applications using powerful technologies like Java and .NET. I have hands-on experience in transforming monolithic systems into microservices architectures and a strong commitment to writing clean code on both the backend and frontend. I am passionate about learning new technologies and solving complex problems.
resume_description: My professional experience and academic achievements throughout my career journey.
resume_job1_desc1: Developed and maintained web applications for the investment and finance sector using .NET, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
resume_job1_desc2: Handled both frontend and backend development, ensuring seamless integration and performance.
resume_job1_desc3: Customized user interfaces and implemented multilingual support for international clients.
resume_job2_desc1: Supported backend development with Java and Spring Framework.
resume_job2_desc2: Contributed to the transformation of monolithic systems to a microservices architecture.
resume_job2_desc3: Built and tested new service modules aligned with business requirements.
resume_edu1_desc: Graduated with High Honors (GPA: 3.70/4.00). Throughout my university life, I solidified my software development fundamentals by participating in numerous theoretical and practical projects.
services_description: Core competencies I possess in various stages of the software development lifecycle.
service1_desc: Building secure, high-performance, and scalable backend systems using Java (Spring Boot) and C# (.NET).
service2_desc: Designing and developing user-friendly and modern interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
service3_desc: Efficient schema design, query optimization, and data management on PostgreSQL and MSSQL databases.
service4_desc: Experience in transitioning from monolithic systems to Microservices architecture and applying design patterns like MVC.
service5_desc: Containerization with Docker, version control with Git, and project and process management with Jira.
service6_desc: In-depth knowledge of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles and Agile project management methodologies.
skills_description: The languages, frameworks, and tools I actively use in my projects.
projects_description: Some significant projects I have developed using my skills. Click on them to see the details and code.
project1_tech: Java, Spring Boot, React, Gemini AI
blog_description: My thoughts and articles on technical topics. Click on them to read more.
blog1_title: Building Your First CRUD API with Spring Boot and JPA
blog1_desc: In this article, I explained step-by-step how to transform a simple 'Hello World' application into a fully functional CRUD REST API with a database connection.
blog2_title: Create and Test Your First Spring Boot Project
blog2_desc: A practical start to the Spring ecosystem for Java developers. I covered creating, running, and testing a Spring Boot project from scratch.
